name: PlayShifu Interactive Globe for Kids – Orboot Earth Explorer: Tech Powered Interactive Globe for Kids | Smart Gift for Ages 4+ | 400+ Wonders, 1000+ Facts | Constellation Mode & Fun Games | Magic Stylus | Educational STEM Toys for the future scientists
short_description: ORBOOT EARTH EXPLORER Interactive, award-winning globe toy for ages 4+. Simply scan the smart globe with your device using the free companion app and watch it come alive on your screen
IN THE BOX - 10” smart globe, 2 Zap-on panels, Magic stylus with Black light, Passport, Stamp, Sticker book, USB cable, Quick start guide. (Device not included)
CONSTELLATION MODE - Press the dual-light switch on the globe and watch as 60+ constellations light up the globe. Learn their names and how they appear in the night sky
MAGIC STYLUS - Draw or write on the globe with the invisible magic stylus and see your creations only under the black light!
INCLUDES GAMES, QUIZZES, QUESTS - Go on scavenger hunts, balance ecosystems, play hide and seek with the stars, and test your knowledge with engaging quizzes for a fun, game-based learning experience

name: LeapFrog LeapGlobe Light-Up and Touch Interactive Electronic Globe for Kids, Exploration Toy for Ages 3 and Up
short_description: [Global Exploration at Your Fingertips] Go for a spin around this interactive globe featuring 48 touch points for a whole world of things to explore
[Discover Landmarks, Languages and Animals Around the Globe] Discover amazing animals; loads of landmarks; greetings in French, Mandarin, and Spanish; and fantastic foods across four category buttons
[Many Modes for Hours of Exploration] Play in "Exploration," "Music," and "Find-It" modes to discover new things, hear world music and play an exciting quiz gam
[Light-Up Touch Features You Control] Curious adventurers can give the world a turn and see the lights glow in a rainbow of colors
[Discover Music From Around the World] Listen to music inspired by instruments and melodies from different countries to experience learning through songs
[Intended for Ages 3+ Years] Requires 2 AA batteries; batteries included for demo purposes only; new batteries recommended for regular use
product_description: Take a spin around the world, see a rainbow of lights and discover amazing wonders on this interactive globe toy. Go on an adventure and tap the 48 touch points to get to know amazing animals, explore loads of landmarks, hear global greetings and feast on food facts. Finding out what a giant panda eats, what the Taj Mahal is made of, how to say hello in Germany, and what kind of food people eat in Japan are just a taste of the fascinating things you’ll discover. Show off what you’ve learned in "Find-It" mode by playing an exciting quiz game or explore world music with songs inspired by instruments and melodies from around the globe. Get ready for the trip of a lifetime! Modes to Explore Hear the names of continents, play games and more in "Exploration," "Find-It," and "Music" modes for engaging geography discoveries. The World at Your Fingertips Explore 48 touch points across four category buttons that introduce greetings in different languages, amazing animals, loads of landmarks and fantastic foods. [Intended for ages 3+ years. Requires 2 AA batteries. Batteries included for demo purposes only. New batteries recommended for regular use.]
